events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I purchased last week because it does not fit and I have decided not to keep it.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to a recent purchase and customer dissatisfaction with fit.
An agent from the returns department has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello! I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund smoothly, I will need the order number and confirmation that the item is unused and in original condition.
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is still in its original packaging and has not been worn.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process. You will receive a confirmation email once the refund is completed within 5 business days.
Great, thank you for your quick response and help in processing the refund so promptly.
The refund request case is now resolved. Please expect the amount to be credited shortly to your payment method.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this refund case. Please contact us anytime if you have any further questions.
